p: Bayesian model selection chose the Bayesian Skyline demographic model with an uncorrelated relaxed clock as the one that best fit the data. Molecular clock calibration estimated the evolutionary rate of the 2019-nCoV whole genome sequences at 6.58 × 10 −3 substitutions site per year (95% HPD 5.2 × 10 −3 – 8.1 × 10 −3).
